#  maths  #
[![ISC licenced](https://badgen.net/static/licence/ISC/?labelColor=24273A&icon=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHhtbG5zOnhsaW5rPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8xOTk5L3hsaW5rIiB4bWw6c3BhY2U9InByZXNlcnZlIiB3aWR0aD0iODAwIiBoZWlnaHQ9IjgwMCIgdmlld0JveD0iMCAwIDMwNSAzMTAiPjxkZWZzPjxsaW5lYXJHcmFkaWVudCBpZD0iYSI%2BPHN0b3Agb2Zmc2V0PSIwIiBzdG9wLWNvbG9yPSIjOGNhYWVlIi8%%2BPGZpbHRlciBpZD0iYyIgd2lkdGg9IjEuMDI1NiIgaGVpZ2h0PSIxLjAxOTYiIHg9IjAiIHk9IjAiIGNvbG9yLWludGVycG9sYXRpb24tZmlsdGVycz0ic1JHQiI%%&color=8AADF4&scale=1.5)](https://github.com/Omnikron13/go-utils?tab=ISC-1-ov-file)

Wrappers for standard library maths functions, taking advantage of generics & type constraints to make your code
cleaner, less verbose, and generally more pleasant to write and read.
